task.title: Producer application basics
task.shortdesc: For a JMS producer application, perform the basic steps contained in this topic.

step.cmd: Retrieve a connection factory object from a JNDI repository.
Create a connection using the connection factory object.
Create a session using the connection object.
Retrieve a destination object from a JNDI repository.

info.note: For the Beta release, only topic destinations are supported.

step.cmd: Use the session object and the destination object to create a message producer.
Use the session object to create a message object.
Use the message producer to send messages to the destination.
